snippet.title: Mega Man World 4 DX - colorization hack
snippet.description:
Mega Man World 4 DX is now available!
The last piece of Game Boy Mega Man colorization project is here. The fourth entry in the Mega Man World series is a very beloved one and it's also considered one of the best games in the franchise.
Face Ballade, the new menace made by Dr. Wily and save the world again as the blue bomber!

FEATURES
- full color conversion
- slowdowns removed
- NES styled pause screen
- works in real GBC hardware and emulators

Download patch at: https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-4-dx/


Check out the Mega Man Mania revival project:
- Mega Man World: Dr. Wily's Revenge GBC - https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/7492/
- Mega Man World 2 GBC - https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/8688/
- Mega Man World 3 DX - https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-3-dx/
- Mega Man World 4 DX - https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-4-dx/
- Mega Man World 5 DX - https://www.marcrobledo.com/game-boy/mega-man-world-5-dx/
- Mega Man Mania - https://youtu.be/R-mmBJQliKQ

Trailer song by 40nix:
- [Mega Man Maker] MMIV - Wily Battleship Stage - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vFJvxti-X7U
